shortcontents.shortcontent: I) Daily Office Prayers and Litanies (fols. 5va-15va) II) Śǝrʿatä qǝddase “Ordinary of the Mass” (fols. 15vb-32ra) III) Anaphoras (fols. 32ra-99vb) III-1) Anaphora of the Apostles (fols. 32ra-39vb) III-2) Anaphora of Our Lord Jesus Christ (preceded by the excerpt from the “Book of the Testament”) (fols. 40rb-40ra) III-3) Anaphora of Our Lady by St. Cyriacus of Behnesa (fols. 42ra-48vb) III-4) Anaphora of St. John Chrysostom (fols. 49ra-52va) III-5) Anaphora of St. John, Son of Thunder (fols. 52vb-59ra) III-6) Anaphora of St. Dioscorus of Alexandria (fols. 59ra-61ra) III-7) Anaphora of St. Epiphanius of Cyprus (fols. 61ra-66va) III-8) Anaphora of St. Jacob of Serug (fols. 66va-70vb) III-9) Anaphora of St. Athanasius of Alexandria (fols. 70vb-77vb) III-10) Anaphora of the 318 Orthodox Fathers of Nicaea (fols. 78ra-83rb) III-11) Anaphora of St. Gregory (“Hosanna-liturgy of St. Gregory”) (fols. 83va-88ra) III-12) Second Anaphora of St. Gregory (“Christmas-liturgy of St. Gregory”) (fols. 88rb-90rb) III-13) Anaphora of St. Basil of Caesarea (fols. 90va-96ra) III-14) Anaphora of St. Cyril of Alexandria (fols. 96ra-99vb) IV) Ṣälotä ʿǝṭan “Prayer of the Incense” (fols. 101ra-104vb).

donors.donor: ʿAmätä Śǝllase (name mentioned in supplication formulas, written in crude handwriting, in the upper margin of fols. 83v, 88r and on fol. 99vb).

txstates.txstate: Many folios are stained with dirt. The upper outer edge of fol. 33 is rumpled. Front cover is cracked and repaired. The sewing is repaired with modern synthetic threads.

bindings.binding: Wooden boards. Two pairs of sewing stations.

txfolios.txfolio: The photos of the five initial folios (fols. 1r-5r) are missing.

squires.squire:
I(8/fols. 5v-12v) – II(8/fols. 13r-20v) – III(8/fols. 21r-28v) – IV(8/fols. 29r-36v) – V(8/fols. 37r-44v) – VI(8/fols. 45r-52v) – VII(8/fols. 53r-60v) – VIII(8/s. l.: 2, stub after 7; 7, stub after 2/fols. 61r-68v) – IX(8/s. l.: 3, stub after 6; 6, stub after 3/fols. 69r-76v) – X(8/fols. 77r-84v) – XI(8/fols. 85r-92v) – XII(8/fols. 93r-100v) – XIII(6/fols. 101r-106v)
For details concerning the initial part of the Ms. s. Number of folios.

taunit.ln-info: average number; actual numbers vary from 28 to 32; 23 in quires VIII and XI; 37 in quire XIII
taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are partly visible (s. fol. 79r). Ruling pricks are mostly visible (s. fol. 94r). Structural pricks are partly visible (s. fols. 43v-44r). The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

txlines.txline: average number; actual numbers vary from 28 to 32; 23 in quires VIII and XI; 37 in quire XIII

rulings.ruling: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are partly visible (s. fol. 79r). Ruling pricks are mostly visible (s. fol. 94r). The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

ptypeofscripts.ptypeofscript: Second half of the 19th cent. - beginning of the 20th cent. (?)

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; incipits and headings of the texts; directives for the ministers; most of the abbreviations; some of the musical notation signs above the lines; elements of the punctuation signs and Ethiopic numbers.

abbreviations.abbreviation: (ይ)ካ፡ for ይበል፡ ካህን፡ (ይ)ዲ፡ for ይበል፡ ዲያቆን፡ (ይ)ሕ፡ for ይበል፡ ሕዝብ፡ ቡራ፡ for ቡራኬ፡ እማ፡ for እማሬ፡ ን(ስ)፡ እ(ግ)፡ ወ(ና)፡ for ንስእለከ፡ እግዚኦ፡ ወናስተበቍዓከ፡ (s. fol. 102rb) አኵ፡ ወስ፡ ስም፡ እግዚ፡ for አኵት፡ ወስቡሕ፡ ስምከ፡ እግዚኦ፡ (s. fol. 104rb)

extras.extra: - Fol. 100v: Crude notes, unfinished in the upper part and mostly erased in the lower part of the page. - Fols. 104v, 105r: Crude notes, apparently concerning the donation of the Ms. (mention of wäyzäro ʾAmätä Śǝllase, the donor), using Tǝgrǝñña genitive particle ና(ይ፡). - Fol. 105v: Crude notes covering greater part of the page, in part hardly legible. - Fol. 106r: Crude notes accompanying the drawings. - Part of the text in fol. 61ra and Text IV are written in compressed script.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: Red thread inserted in the outer edge of fol. 26, for navigation in the text.

drawing.details: Very crude drawing of a human-like figure (an angel?).

frames.frame: - Fol. 32ra: Narrow black ornamental band with geometric ornamentation motifs. - Fol. 40rb: Narrow coloured (red, black) ornamental band with geometric ornamentation motifs. - Fol. 42ra: Narrow black ornamental band with geometric ornamentation motifs. - Fol. 49ra: Narrow black ornamental band with geometric ornamentation motifs. - Fol. 52vb: Narrow black ornamental band with geometric ornamentation motifs. - Fol. 59ra: Narrow black ornamental band with geometric ornamentation motifs. - Fol. 61ra: Narrow black ornamental band with geometric ornamentation motifs. - Fol. 66va: Narrow coloured (red, black) ornamental band with geometric ornamentation motifs. - Fol. 78ra: Narrow black ornamental band with geometric ornamentation motifs. - Fol. 88rb: Narrow black ornamental band with geometric ornamentation motifs.
